name: Nelson Mark
description: What to say about myself? Of course, I can tell you a lot of pleasant qualities about my person, but I think, it would be better, if you can feel me and see my real character. I am as I am. I can be naive, I can be harmful and sensual, tender and passionate at the same time. But first of all, I want to tell, that I am romantic, kind and optimistic man. and I want to love and be loved. I think, it’s normal desire for every man. Do you agree with me? I am not looking just for a flirt on this site, I do not need just a virtual flirt. Only a real and serious, romantic relationship with real happiness with my lovely woman. Is this you?
